feeder_dqn_training.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 # See README.md for more info.
4 # Training done here using vector as input.
5 # Overall structure of this code adopted from an online blog, source is unfortunately lost.
6 
7 import sys
8 import random
9 import env
10 import robot_stepper_client
11 import csv_interface
12 import numpy as np
13 from collections import deque
14 from keras.models import Sequential
15 from keras.layers import Dense
16 from keras.optimizers import Adam
17 from keras.models import model_from_json
18 import time
19 import numpy as np
20 
21 GAMMA = 0.1 # Discount factor
22 LEARNING_RATE = 0.001
23 
24 # Memory replay
25 MEMORY_SIZE = 1000000
26 BATCH_SIZE = 20
27 
28 # Exploration vs exploitation
29 EXPLORATION_MAX = 1.0
30 EXPLORATION_MIN = 0.01
31 EXPLORATION_DECAY = 0.1
32 
33 # Incremental change tracker for convergence check
34 DELTA = 0
35 
36 class DQNSolver:
37 
38  def __init__(self, observation_space, action_space):
39  self.exploration_rate = EXPLORATION_MAX
40 
41  self.action_space = action_space
42  self.memory = deque(maxlen=MEMORY_SIZE)
43  self.observation_space = observation_space
44 
45  def build_fresh(self):
46  self.model = Sequential()
47  self.model.add(Dense(24,
48  input_dim=self.observation_space, # 1D = nS
49  activation="relu"))
50  self.model.add(Dense(24, activation="relu"))
51  self.model.add(Dense(24, activation="relu"))
52  self.model.add(Dense(self.action_space, activation="linear"))
53  self.model.compile(loss="mse", optimizer=Adam(lr=LEARNING_RATE))
54  self.train_mode = True
55 
56 #Save to memory
57  def remember(self, state, action, reward, next_state, done):
58  self.memory.append((state, action, reward, next_state, done))
59 
60  def clearMemory(self):
61  self.memory = deque(maxlen=MEMORY_SIZE)
62 
63  def act(self, state):
64  if np.random.rand() < self.exploration_rate and self.train_mode:
65  return random.randrange(self.action_space)
66  q_values = self.model.predict(state)
67  return np.argmax(q_values[0])
68 
69 # Performs the actual Q value updates by reading memory.
70  def experience_replay(self, episode):
71  if len(self.memory) < BATCH_SIZE:
72  return
73  batch = random.sample(list(self.memory), BATCH_SIZE)
74  for state, action, reward, state_next, terminal in batch:
75  q_update = reward
76  if not terminal:
77  q_update = (reward + GAMMA * np.amax(self.model.predict(state_next)[0]))
78  q_values = self.model.predict(state)
79  q_variation = q_values[0][action] - q_update
80  global DELTA
81  DELTA = min(DELTA, abs(q_variation))
82  q_values[0][action] = q_update
83  self.model.fit(state, q_values, verbose=0)
84  self.exploration_rate = EXPLORATION_MIN + (EXPLORATION_MAX - EXPLORATION_MIN)*np.exp(-EXPLORATION_DECAY*episode)
85  return q_variation**2
86  # return abs(q_variation)
87 
88  def save_model(self, json_file, weights_file):
89  model_json = self.model.to_json()
90  json_file_name = json_file
91  with open(json_file,"w") as json_file:
92  json_file.write(model_json)
93  self.model.save_weights(weights_file)
94  print("Saved model to {}".format(json_file_name))
95  print("Saved weights to {}".format(weights_file))
96 
97  def load_model(self):
98  json_file = open('feeder_dqn.json', 'r')
99  loaded_model_json = json_file.read()
100  json_file.close()
101  loaded_model = model_from_json(loaded_model_json)
102  # load weights into new model
103  loaded_model.load_weights("feeder_dqn.h5")
104  print("Loaded model from disk")
105  self.model = loaded_model
106  self.model.compile(loss="mse", optimizer=Adam(lr=LEARNING_RATE))
107  self.train_mode = False
108  return loaded_model
109 
110 # Once model is trained, use this to extract Q table.
111  def getQTable(self, verbose=False):
112  policy = []
113  q_table=[]
114  for state in range(env.nS):
115  state_vector = np.zeros(self.observation_space)
116  state_vector[state] = 1
117  state_vector = np.reshape(state_vector,[1,self.observation_space])
118  q_values = self.model.predict(state_vector)
119  if verbose:
120  print("S:{} Q:{}".format(state,q_values[0]))
121  policy.append(np.argmax(q_values[0]))
122  q_table.append(q_values)
123 
124  if verbose:
125  print("Optimum policy: ")
126  print(policy)
127  return q_table, policy
128 
129 
130  def saveResults(self, policy_file, json_file, weights_file, performance_file):
131  qtable, policy = self.getQTable(verbose=False)
132  self.save_model(json_file,weights_file)
133  print("Saving DQN policy to : {}".format(policy_file))
134  csv_interface.writePolicyArrayToCsv(policy_file, policy)
135  print("Saving DQN performance to: {}".format(performance_file))
136 
137 # Main function
138 def feeder():
139  # Load params from launch file, or defaults
140  if len(sys.argv) == 10:
141  dqn_policy_file = sys.argv[1]
142  dqn_json_file = sys.argv[2]
143  dqn_weights_file = sys.argv[3]
144  STEPS_PER_EPISODE = int(sys.argv[5])
145  total_episodes = int(sys.argv[4])
146  loss_threshold = float(sys.argv[6])
147  dqn_performance_file = sys.argv[7]
148  else:
149  dqn_policy_file = "DQN_policy.csv"
150  dqn_json_file = "DQN_model.json"
151  dqn_weights_file = "DQN_model.h5"
152  STEPS_PER_EPISODE = 50
153  total_episodes = 10 * STEPS_PER_EPISODE
154  loss_threshold= 0.005
155  dqn_performance_file = "DQN_performance.csv"
156 
157  print("")
158  print("Save space:")
159  print(" Policy - {}".format(dqn_policy_file))
160  print(" Model.json - {}".format(dqn_json_file))
161  print(" Model.weights - {}".format(dqn_weights_file))
162  print("Running for {} episodes until loss of {}".format(total_episodes, loss_threshold))
163  time.sleep(1)
164 
165  # Define model
166  observation_space = env.nS
167  action_space = env.nA
168  state_list = range(0, observation_space)
169  action_list = range(0, action_space)
170 
171  # Setup NN
172  dqn_solver = DQNSolver(observation_space, action_space)
173  dqn_solver.build_fresh()
174  states_visited = np.zeros(dqn_solver.observation_space)
175  episode = 0
176 
177  csv_interface.writeQTableToCsv(dqn_performance_file, np.array([("episode","reward","avg_loss","epsilon")]) )
178  # Start training
179  for episode in range(total_episodes):
180  # episode += 1
181  state = random.choice(state_list)
182 
183  run = 0
184  total_reward = 0
185  avg_loss = 0.0
186  for run in range(STEPS_PER_EPISODE):
187 
188  # Input shaping is done here. Instead of having a single input neuron with 30 values (for 30 states), a vector of size 30 is used (ie 30 neurons).
189  # ONE of the indices of the vecotor has value 1, indicating the actual input state corresponding to the index, other indices are 0
190  # Example: Vector = [0, 0, 1, 0, 0, ... 0] = State 2 & Vector = [0, 0, 0, 1, 0, ... 0] = State 3 and so on.
191  # This is done because the dataset for training the NN is small and uncorrelated. Without input shaping, NN never trains.
192  state_vector = np.zeros(dqn_solver.observation_space)
193  state_vector[state] = 1
194  state_vector = np.reshape(state_vector,[1,dqn_solver.observation_space])
195 
196  states_visited[state] += 1
197  action = dqn_solver.act(state_vector)
198  state_next, reward, terminal, info = robot_stepper_client.step(state, action, "False")
199  state_next = np.reshape(state_next,[1,])
200 
201  if dqn_solver.train_mode:
202  state_next_vector = np.zeros(dqn_solver.observation_space)
203  state_next_vector[state_next] = 1
204  state_next_vector = np.reshape(state_next_vector,[1,dqn_solver.observation_space])
205  dqn_solver.remember(state_vector, action, reward, state_next_vector, terminal)
206  state = state_next
207  total_reward += reward
208  if dqn_solver.train_mode:
209  loss = dqn_solver.experience_replay(episode)
210  if loss>0:
211  avg_loss = (avg_loss+loss)/2
212 
213  csv_interface.appendPerformaceData(dqn_performance_file, np.array([(episode,total_reward,avg_loss,dqn_solver.exploration_rate)]) )
214  print("")
215 
216  table, policy = dqn_solver.getQTable(verbose=False)
217  # print("Ep: {} eps:{} avg_loss {} total_reward: {}".format((episode+1)*STEPS_PER_EPISODE, dqn_solver.exploration_rate, avg_loss, total_reward))
218  print("Ep: {} eps:{} avg_loss {} total_reward: {}".format(episode, dqn_solver.exploration_rate, avg_loss, total_reward))
219  print("Optimum policy: {}".format(policy))
220 
221  if avg_loss <= loss_threshold:
222  print("Loss threshold satisfied, breaking at ep : {}!!".format(episode))
223  break
224  # if total_reward == 300:
225  # print("Max reward obtained, breaking!! @ ep : {}".format(episode))
226  # break
227 
228  # print("States visited :", states_visited)
229 
230  print("")
231  print("Q Table: ")
232  dqn_solver.getQTable(verbose=True)
233 
234  print("")
235  if dqn_solver.train_mode:
236  dqn_solver.saveResults(dqn_policy_file,dqn_json_file,dqn_weights_file,dqn_performance_file)
237  print("")
238 
239 if __name__=="__main__":
240  feeder()
